thread.title: Anti-Semitic Graffiti Spray Painted on Portland, Oregon synagogue
thread.title_full: Anti-Semitic Graffiti Spray Painted on Portland, Oregon synagogue

author: JPUpdates Staff
title: Anti-Semitic Graffiti Spray Painted on Portland, Oregon synagogue
text:
Photo Credit: Rabbi Michael Kaplan 
An act of anti-Semitic vandalism against a Portland, Oregon synagogue is under investigation by police. 
Rabbi Michael Kaplan of Congregation Ahavath Achim-Sephardic on SW Barbur Blvd. said someone painted a Nazi swastika, a misspelled reference to President Obama (Oboma is 666), the number 5 and USA on the buildingâ€™s exterior. The graffiti, first spotted early Wednesday morning, has since been painted over. 
Rabbi Kaplan said his synagogue is the most prominently placed of any in Portland, making it an easy target. 
Police came to the scene and filed a report, according to Kaplan. Sergeant Pete Simpson, a spokesman for the Portland Police Bureau, said there are currently no suspects or reports of similar incidents. 
In February 1989, anti-Jewish slogans were sprayed in red paint on the exterior walls of this synagogue, as well as Congregation Neveh Shalom.
